name: @smartcloudai/Application
description: The Smart Cloud by TGT Media Ltd, the all in one solution to social media intergrations for small companies and communities

scripts.install: npm install pm2 lerna git-submodule-tool -g && git submodule update --init && gst fetch && gst pull && lerna link && lerna bootstrap && tsc -p packages/command-line-interface && cd packages/command-line-interface && npm install -g
